DataElement.preferredName: Patient Concomitant Agent Stop Prior To Therapeutic Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A question which asks whether or not a patient enrolled in stratum number specified in the study has concomitant use of agents and connot stop use prior to the start of trial treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Concomitant Agent Stop Prior To Therapeutic Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Accessory, accompanying especially in a subordinate or incidental way, occurring or existing during the same period of time._An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect._Put an end to a state or an activity._Earlier in time or order._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Concomitant Agent Stop Prior To Therapeutic Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Accessory, accompanying especially in a subordinate or incidental way, occurring or existing during the same period of time.:An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.:Put an end to a state or an activity.:Earlier in time or order.:Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Accessory, accompanying especially in a subordinate or incidental way, occurring or existing during the same period of time.
An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.
Put an end to a state or an activity.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is enrolled under Stratum 1, 2, or 3, does patient concomitantly use St. John's wort and cannot stop prior to the start of trial treatment?

DataElement.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElement.administrativeNotes: 7/19/2022: fixed the box symbol in PQT.wz
